diff.csalgen.w
df-salgen
blocks.content: Define the sigma-algebra generated by a given set. Definition 111G (b) of [Fremlin1] p. 13. The sigma-algebra generated by a set is the smallest sigma-algebra, on the same base set, that includes the set, see ~ dfsalgen2 . The base set of the sigma-algebras used for the intersection needs to be the same, otherwise the resulting set is not guaranteed to be a sigma-algebra, as shown in the counterexample ~ salgencntex . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.) (Revised by Glauco Siliprandi, 1-Jan-2021.)

blocks.name: issal
blocks.content: Express the predicate " ` S ` is a sigma-algebra." (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm issal(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c0, csalg), w3a(wcel(emptycls, c0), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cdif(cuni(c0), cv(s0)), c0)), wral(s0, cpw(c0), wi(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  elab2g(hs0, c0, c1, csalg, w3a(wcel(emptycls, c0), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cdif(cuni(c0), cv(s0)), c0)), wral(s0, cpw(c0), wi(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0)))), w3a(wcel(emptycls, cv(hs0)), wral(s0, cv(hs0), wcel(cdif(cuni(cv(hs0)), cv(s0)), cv(hs0))), wral(s0, cpw(cv(hs0)), wi(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), cv(hs0))))))
  3anbi123d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(emptycls, cv(hs0)), wral(s0, cv(hs0), wcel(cdif(cuni(cv(hs0)), cv(s0)), cv(hs0))), wral(s0, cpw(cv(hs0)), wi(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), cv(hs0)))), wcel(emptycls, c0), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cdif(cuni(c0), cv(s0)), c0)), wral(s0, cpw(c0), wi(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0))))
  eleq2(cv(hs0), c0, emptycls)
  raleqbidv(s0, cv(hs0), c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cdif(cuni(cv(hs0)), cv(s0)), cv(hs0)), wcel(cdif(cuni(c0), cv(s0)), c0))
  eleq12d(cdif(cuni(cv(hs0)), cv(s0)), cv(hs0), cdif(cuni(c0), cv(s0)), c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  difeq1d(cuni(cv(hs0)), cv(s0), cuni(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  unieq(cv(hs0), c0)
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  raleqbidv(s0, cpw(cv(hs0)), cpw(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wi(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), cv(hs0))), wi(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0)))
  pweq(cv(hs0), c0)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), cv(hs0)), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0))
  eleq2(cv(hs0), c0, cuni(cv(s0)))
  df-salg(hs0, s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(w3a(wcel(emptycls, c0), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cdif(cuni(c0), cv(s0)), c0)), wral(s0, cpw(c0), wi(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0)))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm issal(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(c0 ‚àà SAlg ‚Üî(‚àÖ ‚àà c0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,(‚ãÉ c0 \ s0)‚àà c0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà P(c0),(s0[‚âº]_om ‚Üí ‚ãÉ s0 ‚àà c0)))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  elab2g(hs0, c0, c1, csalg, (‚àÖ ‚àà c0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,(‚ãÉ c0 \ s0)‚àà c0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà P(c0),(s0[‚âº]_om ‚Üí ‚ãÉ s0 ‚àà c0))), (‚àÖ ‚àà hs0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà hs0,(‚ãÉ hs0 \ s0)‚àà hs0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà P(hs0),(s0[‚âº]_om ‚Üí ‚ãÉ s0 ‚àà hs0))))
  3anbi123d(hs0 = c0, ‚àÖ ‚àà hs0, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà hs0,(‚ãÉ hs0 \ s0)‚àà hs0), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà P(hs0),(s0[‚âº]_om ‚Üí ‚ãÉ s0 ‚àà hs0)), ‚àÖ ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,(‚ãÉ c0 \ s0)‚àà c0), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà P(c0),(s0[‚âº]_om ‚Üí ‚ãÉ s0 ‚àà c0)))
  eleq2(hs0, c0, emptycls)
  raleqbidv(s0, hs0, c0, hs0 = c0, (‚ãÉ hs0 \ s0)‚àà hs0, (‚ãÉ c0 \ s0)‚àà c0)
  eleq12d((‚ãÉ hs0 \ s0), hs0, (‚ãÉ c0 \ s0), c0, hs0 = c0)
  difeq1d(‚ãÉ hs0, s0, ‚ãÉ c0, hs0 = c0)
  unieq(hs0, c0)
  id(hs0 = c0)
  raleqbidv(s0, P(hs0), P(c0), hs0 = c0, (s0[‚âº]_om ‚Üí ‚ãÉ s0 ‚àà hs0), (s0[‚âº]_om ‚Üí ‚ãÉ s0 ‚àà c0))
  pweq(hs0, c0)
  imbi2d(hs0 = c0, s0[‚âº]_om, ‚ãÉ s0 ‚àà hs0, ‚ãÉ s0 ‚àà c0)
  eleq2(hs0, c0, ‚ãÉ s0)
  df-salg(hs0, s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w((‚àÖ ‚àà c0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,(‚ãÉ c0 \ s0)‚àà c0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà P(c0),(s0[‚âº]_om ‚Üí ‚ãÉ s0 ‚àà c0))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: pwsal
blocks.content: The power set of a given set is a sigma-algebra (the so called discrete sigma-algebra). (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm pwsal(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cpw(c0), csalg))
} = {
  mpbird(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cpw(c0), csalg), w3a(wcel(emptycls, cpw(c0)), wral(hs0, cpw(c0), wcel(cdif(cuni(cpw(c0)), cv(hs0)), cpw(c0))), wral(hs0, cpw(cpw(c0)), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), cpw(c0))))))
  3jca(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(emptycls, cpw(c0)), wral(hs0, cpw(c0), wcel(cdif(cuni(cpw(c0)), cv(hs0)), cpw(c0))), wral(hs0, cpw(cpw(c0)), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), cpw(c0)))))
  a1i(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(emptycls, cpw(c0)))
  0elpw(c0)
  ralrimiva(hs0, cpw(c0), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cdif(cuni(cpw(c0)), cv(hs0)), cpw(c0)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c0)), wcel(cdif(cuni(cpw(c0)), cv(hs0)), cpw(c0)))
  eqeltrd(cdif(cuni(cpw(c0)), cv(hs0)), cpw(c0), cdif(c0, cv(hs0)), wcel(c0, c1))
  a1i(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cdif(cuni(cpw(c0)), cv(hs0)), cdif(c0, cv(hs0))))
  difeq1i(cuni(cpw(c0)), cv(hs0), c0)
  mpbird(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cdif(c0, cv(hs0)), cpw(c0)), wss(cdif(c0, cv(hs0)), c0))
  difssd(c0, cv(hs0), wcel(c0, c1))
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(cdif(c0, cv(hs0)), cpw(c0)), wss(cdif(c0, cv(hs0)), c0)), wcel(cdif(c0, cv(hs0)), universe))
  difexg(c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  elpwg(cdif(c0, cv(hs0)), universe, c0)
  ralrimiva(hs0, cpw(cpw(c0)), wcel(c0, c1), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), cpw(c0))))
  a1d(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cpw(c0)))), wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), cpw(c0)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cpw(c0))), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), cpw(c0)))
  mpbird(wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cpw(c0))), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), cpw(c0)), wss(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0))
  syl6sseq(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0, cuni(cpw(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cpw(c0))))
  syl(wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cpw(c0))), wss(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(cpw(c0))), wss(cv(hs0), cpw(c0)))
  elpwi(cv(hs0), cpw(c0))
  uniss(cv(hs0), cpw(c0))
  unipw(c0)
  syl(wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cpw(c0))), wb(wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), cpw(c0)), wss(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0)), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), universe))
  a1i(wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cpw(c0))), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), universe))
  vuniex(hs0)
  elpwg(cuni(cv(hs0)), universe, c0)
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(cpw(c0), csalg), w3a(wcel(emptycls, cpw(c0)), wral(hs0, cpw(c0), wcel(cdif(cuni(cpw(c0)), cv(hs0)), cpw(c0))), wral(hs0, cpw(cpw(c0)), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), cpw(c0)))))), wcel(cpw(c0), universe))
  pwexg(c0, c1)
  issal(hs0, cpw(c0), universe)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(cpw(c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm pwsal(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí P(c0)‚àà SAlg)
} = {
  mpbird(c0 ‚àà c1, P(c0)‚àà SAlg, (‚àÖ ‚àà P(c0)‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà P(c0),(‚ãÉ P(c0)\ hs0)‚àà P(c0))‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà P(P(c0)),(hs0[‚âº]_om ‚Üí ‚ãÉ hs0 ‚àà P(c0)))))
  3jca(c0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÖ ‚àà P(c0), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà P(c0),(‚ãÉ P(c0)\ hs0)‚àà P(c0)), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà P(P(c0)),(hs0[‚âº]_om ‚Üí ‚ãÉ hs0 ‚àà P(c0))))
  a1i(c0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÖ ‚àà P(c0))
  0elpw(c0)
  ralrimiva(hs0, P(c0), c0 ‚àà c1, (‚ãÉ P(c0)\ hs0)‚àà P(c0))
  adantr(c0 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚àà P(c0), (‚ãÉ P(c0)\ hs0)‚àà P(c0))
  eqeltrd((‚ãÉ P(c0)\ hs0), P(c0), (c0 \ hs0), c0 ‚àà c1)
  a1i(c0 ‚àà c1, (‚ãÉ P(c0)\ hs0)=(c0 \ hs0))
  difeq1i(‚ãÉ P(c0), hs0, c0)
  mpbird(c0 ‚àà c1, (c0 \ hs0)‚àà P(c0), (c0 \ hs0)‚äÜ c0)
  difssd(c0, hs0, c0 ‚àà c1)
  syl(c0 ‚àà c1, ((c0 \ hs0)‚àà P(c0)‚Üî(c0 \ hs0)‚äÜ c0), (c0 \ hs0)‚àà ùïå)
  difexg(c0, c1, hs0)
  elpwg((c0 \ hs0), universe, c0)
  ralrimiva(hs0, P(P(c0)), c0 ‚àà c1, (hs0[‚âº]_om ‚Üí ‚ãÉ hs0 ‚àà P(c0)))
  a1d((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà P(P(c0))), hs0[‚âº]_om, ‚ãÉ hs0 ‚àà P(c0))
  adantl(c0 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚àà P(P(c0)), ‚ãÉ hs0 ‚àà P(c0))
  mpbird(hs0 ‚àà P(P(c0)), ‚ãÉ hs0 ‚àà P(c0), ‚ãÉ hs0 ‚äÜ c0)
  syl6sseq(‚ãÉ hs0, c0, ‚ãÉ P(c0), hs0 ‚àà P(P(c0)))
  syl(hs0 ‚àà P(P(c0)), ‚ãÉ hs0 ‚äÜ ‚ãÉ P(c0), hs0 ‚äÜ P(c0))
  elpwi(hs0, P(c0))
  uniss(hs0, P(c0))
  unipw(c0)
  syl(hs0 ‚àà P(P(c0)), (‚ãÉ hs0 ‚àà P(c0)‚Üî ‚ãÉ hs0 ‚äÜ c0), ‚ãÉ hs0 ‚àà ùïå)
  a1i(hs0 ‚àà P(P(c0)), ‚ãÉ hs0 ‚àà ùïå)
  vuniex(hs0)
  elpwg(‚ãÉ hs0, universe, c0)
  syl(c0 ‚àà c1, (P(c0)‚àà SAlg ‚Üî(‚àÖ ‚àà P(c0)‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà P(c0),(‚ãÉ P(c0)\ hs0)‚àà P(c0))‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà P(P(c0)),(hs0[‚âº]_om ‚Üí ‚ãÉ hs0 ‚àà P(c0))))), P(c0)‚àà ùïå)
  pwexg(c0, c1)
  issal(hs0, P(c0), universe)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ‚àà c1)
  diff.hs0.c(P(c0))
}

blocks.name: salunicl
blocks.content: SAlg sigma-algebra is closed under countable union. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm salunicl(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cuni(c0), c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, csalg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cpw(c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c0, cdom, com))
} = {
  mpd(w0, wcel(cuni(c0), c1), wbr(c0, cdom, com))
  syl2anc(w0, wi(wbr(c0, cdom, com), wcel(cuni(c0), c1)), wcel(c0, cpw(c1)), wral(hs0, cpw(c1), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c1))))
  simp3d(w0, wral(hs0, cpw(c1), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c1))), wcel(emptycls, c1), wral(hs0, c1, wcel(cdif(cuni(c1), cv(hs0)), c1)))
  mpbid(w0, w3a(wcel(emptycls, c1), wral(hs0, c1, wcel(cdif(cuni(c1), cv(hs0)), c1)), wral(hs0, cpw(c1), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c1)))), wcel(c1, csalg))
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(c1, csalg), w3a(wcel(emptycls, c1), wral(hs0, c1, wcel(cdif(cuni(c1), cv(hs0)), c1)), wral(hs0, cpw(c1), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c1))))), wcel(c1, csalg))
  issal(hs0, c1, csalg)
  rspcva(hs0, c0, cpw(c1), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c1)), wi(wbr(c0, cdom, com), wcel(cuni(c0), c1)))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c1), wbr(c0, cdom, com), wcel(cuni(c0), c1))
  breq1(cv(hs0), c0, cdom, com)
  eleq1d(cuni(cv(hs0)), c1, cuni(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  unieq(cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cpw(c1))
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wbr(c0, cdom, com), wcel(cuni(c0), c1)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm salunicl(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí ‚ãÉ c0 ‚àà c1)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà SAlg)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà P(c1))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0[‚âº]_om)
} = {
  mpd(w0, ‚ãÉ c0 ‚àà c1, c0[‚âº]_om)
  syl2anc(w0, (c0[‚âº]_om ‚Üí ‚ãÉ c0 ‚àà c1), c0 ‚àà P(c1), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà P(c1),(hs0[‚âº]_om ‚Üí ‚ãÉ hs0 ‚àà c1)))
  simp3d(w0, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà P(c1),(hs0[‚âº]_om ‚Üí ‚ãÉ hs0 ‚àà c1)), ‚àÖ ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c1,(‚ãÉ c1 \ hs0)‚àà c1))
  mpbid(w0, (‚àÖ ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c1,(‚ãÉ c1 \ hs0)‚àà c1)‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà P(c1),(hs0[‚âº]_om ‚Üí ‚ãÉ hs0 ‚àà c1))), c1 ‚àà SAlg)
  syl(w0, (c1 ‚àà SAlg ‚Üî(‚àÖ ‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c1,(‚ãÉ c1 \ hs0)‚àà c1)‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà P(c1),(hs0[‚âº]_om ‚Üí ‚ãÉ hs0 ‚àà c1)))), c1 ‚àà SAlg)
  issal(hs0, c1, csalg)
  rspcva(hs0, c0, P(c1), (hs0[‚âº]_om ‚Üí ‚ãÉ hs0 ‚àà c1), (c0[‚âº]_om ‚Üí ‚ãÉ c0 ‚àà c1))
  imbi12d(hs0 = c0, hs0[‚âº]_om, ‚ãÉ hs0 ‚àà c1, c0[‚âº]_om, ‚ãÉ c0 ‚àà c1)
  breq1(hs0, c0, cdom, com)
  eleq1d(‚ãÉ hs0, c1, ‚ãÉ c0, hs0 = c0)
  unieq(hs0, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(P(c1))
  diff.hs0.w((c0[‚âº]_om ‚Üí ‚ãÉ c0 ‚àà c1))
}

blocks.name: saluncl
blocks.content: The union of two sets in a sigma-algebra is in the sigma-algebra. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm saluncl(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, csalg), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(cun(c1, c2), c0))
} = {
  eqeltrd(cun(c1, c2), c0, cuni(cpr(c1, c2)), w3a(wcel(c0, csalg), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, c0)))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, csalg), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, c0), wceq(cun(c1, c2), cuni(cpr(c1, c2))))
  eqcomd(cun(c1, c2), cuni(cpr(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, c0)))
  uniprg(c1, c0, c2, c0)
  mpd(w3a(wcel(c0, csalg), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(cuni(cpr(c1, c2)), c0), wbr(cpr(c1, c2), cdom, com))
  a1i(w3a(wcel(c0, csalg), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, c0)), wbr(cpr(c1, c2), cdom, com))
  ax-mp(wbr(cpr(c1, c2), cdom, com), wcel(cpr(c1, c2), cfn))
  prfi(c1, c2)
  syl(wcel(cpr(c1, c2), cfn), wbr(cpr(c1, c2), cdom, com), wbr(cpr(c1, c2), csdm, com))
  biimpi(wcel(cpr(c1, c2), cfn), wbr(cpr(c1, c2), csdm, com))
  isfinite(cpr(c1, c2))
  sdomdom(cpr(c1, c2), com)

blocks.name: saldifcl
blocks.content: The complement of an element of a sigma-algebra is in the sigma-algebra. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm saldifcl(class c0, class c1) {

  simp2d(wcel(c0, csalg), wral(hs0, c0, wcel(cdif(cuni(c0), cv(hs0)), c0)), wcel(emptycls, c0), wral(hs0, cpw(c0), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0))))
  ibi(wcel(c0, csalg), w3a(wcel(emptycls, c0), wral(hs0, c0, wcel(cdif(cuni(c0), cv(hs0)), c0)), wral(hs0, cpw(c0), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), c0)))))
  issal(hs0, c0, csalg)
  simpr(wcel(c0, csalg), wcel(c1, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cdif(cuni(c0), c1), c0))
}

} = {
  eqeltrd(ciun(s0, c0, c1), c2, cuni(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))), w0)

  ssexd(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), c2, csalg, w0)
  syl(w0, wss(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), c2), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, c2)))

  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, csalg), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(c2, c0)), wcel(cun(cdif(cuni(c0), c1), cdif(cuni(c0), c2)), c0), wcel(c0, csalg), wcel(cdif(cuni(c0), c1), c0), wcel(cdif(cuni(c0), c2), c0))

blocks.name: saluni

blocks.name: saliincl

blocks.origin:
thm saliincl(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(ciin(s0, c0, c1), c2))

  eqeltrd(ciin(s0, c0, c1), c2, cdif(cuni(c2), ciun(s0, c0, cdif(cuni(c2), c1))), w0)
  eqtrd(ciin(s0, c0, c1), cdif(cuni(c2), ciun(s0, c0, cdif(cuni(c2), c1))), ciin(s0, c0, cdif(cuni(c2), cdif(cuni(c2), c1))), w0)

  elssuni(c1, c2)
  df-ss(c1, cuni(c2))

  syl(w0, wceq(ciin(s0, c0, cdif(cuni(c2), cdif(cuni(c2), c1))), cdif(cuni(c2), ciun(s0, c0, cdif(cuni(c2), c1)))), wne(c0, emptycls))
  iindif2(s0, c0, cuni(c2), cdif(cuni(c2), c1))
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(cdif(cuni(c2), ciun(s0, c0, cdif(cuni(c2), c1))), c2), wcel(c2, csalg), wcel(ciun(s0, c0, cdif(cuni(c2), c1)), c2))
  saliuncl(s0, c0, cdif(cuni(c2), c1), c2, w0)
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cdif(cuni(c2), c1), c2), wcel(c2, csalg), wcel(c1, c2))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c2, csalg))

thm intsal(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cint(c0), csalg))

  sylibr(c0 ‚àà c1, P(‚ãÉ c0)‚àà { s0 ‚àà SAlg |(‚ãÉ s0 = ‚ãÉ c0 ‚àß c0 ‚äÜ s0)}, (P(‚ãÉ c0)‚àà SAlg ‚àß(‚ãÉ P(‚ãÉ c0)= ‚ãÉ c0 ‚àß c0 ‚äÜ P(‚ãÉ c0))))
  jca(c0 ‚àà c1, P(‚ãÉ c0)‚àà SAlg, (‚ãÉ P(‚ãÉ c0)= ‚ãÉ c0 ‚àß c0 ‚äÜ P(‚ãÉ c0)))
  syl(c0 ‚àà c1, P(‚ãÉ c0)‚àà SAlg, ‚ãÉ c0 ‚àà ùïå)

blocks.name: salgencl
blocks.content: ` SalGen ` actually generates a sigma-algebra. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Jan-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm salgencl(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cfv(csalgen, c0), csalg))
} = {
  eqeltrd(cfv(csalgen, c0), csalg, cint(crab(hs0, csalg, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c0)), wss(c0, cv(hs0))))), wcel(c0, c1))
  salgenval(hs0, c0, c1)
  intsal(hs1, crab(hs0, csalg, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c0)), wss(c0, cv(hs0)))), cuni(c0), wcel(c0, c1))
  a1i(wcel(c0, c1), wss(crab(hs0, csalg, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c0)), wss(c0, cv(hs0)))), csalg))
  ssrab2(hs0, csalg, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c0)), wss(c0, cv(hs0))))
  salgenn0(hs0, c0, c1)
  adantl(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs1), crab(hs0, csalg, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c0)), wss(c0, cv(hs0))))), wceq(cuni(cv(hs1)), cuni(c0)))
  simprld(wcel(cv(hs1), crab(hs0, csalg, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c0)), wss(c0, cv(hs0))))), wceq(cuni(cv(hs1)), cuni(c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), csalg), wss(c0, cv(hs1)))
  biimpi(wcel(cv(hs1), crab(hs0, csalg, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c0)), wss(c0, cv(hs0))))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), csalg), wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs1)), cuni(c0)), wss(c0, cv(hs1)))))
  elrab(hs0, cv(hs1), csalg, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c0)), wss(c0, cv(hs0))), wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs1)), cuni(c0)), wss(c0, cv(hs1))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c0)), wss(c0, cv(hs0)), wceq(cuni(cv(hs1)), cuni(c0)), wss(c0, cv(hs1)))
  eqeq1d(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c0), cuni(cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  unieq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  sseq2(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(crab(hs0, csalg, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c0)), wss(c0, cv(hs0)))))
  diff.hs1.c(cuni(c0))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(csalg)
  diff.hs0.c(cv(hs1))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs1)), cuni(c0)), wss(c0, cv(hs1))))
}

blocks.name: issald
blocks.content: Sufficient condition to prove that ` S ` is sigma-algebra. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Jan-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm issald(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, csalg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(emptycls, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cdif(c2, cv(s0)), c0))
  -| wi(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c0)), wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com)), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpbir3and(w0, wcel(c0, csalg), wcel(emptycls, c0), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cdif(cuni(c0), cv(s0)), c0)), wral(s0, cpw(c0), wi(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0))))
  ralrimiva(s0, c0, w0, wcel(cdif(cuni(c0), cv(s0)), c0))
  syl5eqel(cdif(cuni(c0), cv(s0)), c0, cdif(c2, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  difeq1i(cuni(c0), cv(s0), c2)
  eqcomi(cuni(c0), c2)
  ralrimiva(s0, cpw(c0), w0, wi(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0)))
  3expia(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c0)), wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0))
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(c0, csalg), w3a(wcel(emptycls, c0), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cdif(cuni(c0), cv(s0)), c0)), wral(s0, cpw(c0), wi(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0))))), wcel(c0, c1))
  issal(s0, c0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm issald(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà SAlg)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c1)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí ‚àÖ ‚àà c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 = ‚ãÉ c0
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0)‚Üí(c2 \ s0)‚àà c0)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà P(c0)‚àß s0[‚âº]_om)‚Üí ‚ãÉ s0 ‚àà c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpbir3and(w0, c0 ‚àà SAlg, ‚àÖ ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,(‚ãÉ c0 \ s0)‚àà c0), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà P(c0),(s0[‚âº]_om ‚Üí ‚ãÉ s0 ‚àà c0)))
  ralrimiva(s0, c0, w0, (‚ãÉ c0 \ s0)‚àà c0)
  syl5eqel((‚ãÉ c0 \ s0), c0, (c2 \ s0), (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0))
  difeq1i(‚ãÉ c0, s0, c2)
  eqcomi(‚ãÉ c0, c2)
  ralrimiva(s0, P(c0), w0, (s0[‚âº]_om ‚Üí ‚ãÉ s0 ‚àà c0))
  3expia(w0, s0 ‚àà P(c0), s0[‚âº]_om, ‚ãÉ s0 ‚àà c0)
  syl(w0, (c0 ‚àà SAlg ‚Üî(‚àÖ ‚àà c0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0,(‚ãÉ c0 \ s0)‚àà c0)‚àß ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà P(c0),(s0[‚âº]_om ‚Üí ‚ãÉ s0 ‚àà c0)))), c0 ‚àà c1)
  issal(s0, c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: salexct
blocks.content: An example of nontrivial sigma-algebra: the collection of all subsets which either are countable or have countable complement. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Jan-2021.)

blocks.name: sssalgen
blocks.content: A set is a subset of the sigma-algebra it generates. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Jan-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm sssalgen(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c0, c2))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(csalgen, c0))
} = {
  sseqtrd(c0, c2, cint(crab(hs0, csalg, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c0)), wss(c0, cv(hs0))))), wcel(c0, c1))
  a1i(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c0, cint(crab(hs0, csalg, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c0)), wss(c0, cv(hs0)))))))
  mprgbir(hs1, crab(hs0, csalg, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c0)), wss(c0, cv(hs0)))), wss(c0, cint(crab(hs0, csalg, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c0)), wss(c0, cv(hs0)))))), wss(c0, cv(hs1)))
  ssint(hs1, c0, crab(hs0, csalg, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c0)), wss(c0, cv(hs0)))))
  simprrd(wcel(cv(hs1), crab(hs0, csalg, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c0)), wss(c0, cv(hs0))))), wss(c0, cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs1), csalg), wceq(cuni(cv(hs1)), cuni(c0)))
  biimpi(wcel(cv(hs1), crab(hs0, csalg, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c0)), wss(c0, cv(hs0))))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), csalg), wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs1)), cuni(c0)), wss(c0, cv(hs1)))))
  elrab(hs0, cv(hs1), csalg, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c0)), wss(c0, cv(hs0))), wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs1)), cuni(c0)), wss(c0, cv(hs1))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c0)), wss(c0, cv(hs0)), wceq(cuni(cv(hs1)), cuni(c0)), wss(c0, cv(hs1)))
  eqeq1d(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c0), cuni(cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  unieq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  sseq2(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c0)
  syl5req(cint(crab(hs0, csalg, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c0)), wss(c0, cv(hs0))))), c2, cfv(csalgen, c0), wcel(c0, c1))
  salgenval(hs0, c0, c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(crab(hs0, csalg, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c0)), wss(c0, cv(hs0)))))
  diff.hs0.c(cv(hs1))
  diff.hs0.c(csalg)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs1)), cuni(c0)), wss(c0, cv(hs1))))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}

  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí c0 ‚äÜ c2)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(SalGen ` c0)
} = {
  sseqtrd(c0, c2, ‚ãÇ { hs0 ‚àà SAlg |(‚ãÉ hs0 = ‚ãÉ c0 ‚àß c0 ‚äÜ hs0)}, c0 ‚àà c1)
  a1i(c0 ‚àà c1, c0 ‚äÜ ‚ãÇ { hs0 ‚àà SAlg |(‚ãÉ hs0 = ‚ãÉ c0 ‚àß c0 ‚äÜ hs0)})

  biimpi(hs1 ‚àà { hs0 ‚àà SAlg |(‚ãÉ hs0 = ‚ãÉ c0 ‚àß c0 ‚äÜ hs0)}, (hs1 ‚àà SAlg ‚àß(‚ãÉ hs1 = ‚ãÉ c0 ‚àß c0 ‚äÜ hs1)))
  elrab(hs0, hs1, csalg, (‚ãÉ hs0 = ‚ãÉ c0 ‚àß c0 ‚äÜ hs0), (‚ãÉ hs1 = ‚ãÉ c0 ‚àß c0 ‚äÜ hs1))

  diff.hs0.c(hs1)

  diff.hs0.w((‚ãÉ hs1 = ‚ãÉ c0 ‚àß c0 ‚äÜ hs1))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}

blocks.name: salgenss
blocks.content: The sigma-algebra generated by a set is the smallest sigma-algebra, on the same base set, that includes the set. Proposition 111G (b) of [Fremlin1] p. 13. Notice that the condition "on the same base set" is needed, see the counterexample ~ salgensscntex , where a sigma-algebra is shown that includes a set, but does not include the sigma-algebra generated (the key is that its base set is larger than the base set of the generating set). (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Jan-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm salgenss(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(csalgen, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, csalg))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c2, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cuni(c1), cuni(c2)))
} = {
  eqsstrd(c0, c1, cint(crab(hs0, csalg, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c2)), wss(c2, cv(hs0))))), w0)
  eqtrd(c0, cint(crab(hs0, csalg, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c2)), wss(c2, cv(hs0))))), cfv(csalgen, c2), w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(c0, cfv(csalgen, c2)))
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(csalgen, c2), cint(crab(hs0, csalg, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c2)), wss(c2, cv(hs0)))))), wcel(c2, c3))
  salgenval(hs0, c2, c3)
  syl(w0, wss(cint(crab(hs0, csalg, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c2)), wss(c2, cv(hs0))))), c1), wcel(c1, crab(hs0, csalg, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c2)), wss(c2, cv(hs0))))))
  sylibr(w0, wcel(c1, crab(hs0, csalg, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c2)), wss(c2, cv(hs0))))), wa(wcel(c1, csalg), wa(wceq(cuni(c1), cuni(c2)), wss(c2, c1))))
  jca(w0, wcel(c1, csalg), wa(wceq(cuni(c1), cuni(c2)), wss(c2, c1)))
  jca(w0, wceq(cuni(c1), cuni(c2)), wss(c2, c1))
  elrab(hs0, c1, csalg, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c2)), wss(c2, cv(hs0))), wa(wceq(cuni(c1), cuni(c2)), wss(c2, c1)))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c2)), wss(c2, cv(hs0)), wceq(cuni(c1), cuni(c2)), wss(c2, c1))
  eqeq1d(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c2), cuni(c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  unieq(cv(hs0), c1)
  sseq2(cv(hs0), c1, c2)
  intss1(c1, crab(hs0, csalg, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c2)), wss(c2, cv(hs0)))))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(csalg)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wceq(cuni(c1), cuni(c2)), wss(c2, c1)))
}

thm salgenss(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚äÜ c1)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(SalGen ` c2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà SAlg)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚äÜ c1)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí ‚ãÉ c1 = ‚ãÉ c2)
} = {
  eqsstrd(c0, c1, ‚ãÇ { hs0 ‚àà SAlg |(‚ãÉ hs0 = ‚ãÉ c2 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ hs0)}, w0)
  eqtrd(c0, ‚ãÇ { hs0 ‚àà SAlg |(‚ãÉ hs0 = ‚ãÉ c2 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ hs0)}, (SalGen ` c2), w0)
  a1i(w0, c0 =(SalGen ` c2))
  syl(w0, (SalGen ` c2)= ‚ãÇ { hs0 ‚àà SAlg |(‚ãÉ hs0 = ‚ãÉ c2 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ hs0)}, c2 ‚àà c3)
  salgenval(hs0, c2, c3)
  syl(w0, ‚ãÇ { hs0 ‚àà SAlg |(‚ãÉ hs0 = ‚ãÉ c2 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ hs0)} ‚äÜ c1, c1 ‚àà { hs0 ‚àà SAlg |(‚ãÉ hs0 = ‚ãÉ c2 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ hs0)})
  sylibr(w0, c1 ‚àà { hs0 ‚àà SAlg |(‚ãÉ hs0 = ‚ãÉ c2 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ hs0)}, (c1 ‚àà SAlg ‚àß(‚ãÉ c1 = ‚ãÉ c2 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1)))
  jca(w0, c1 ‚àà SAlg, (‚ãÉ c1 = ‚ãÉ c2 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1))
  jca(w0, ‚ãÉ c1 = ‚ãÉ c2, c2 ‚äÜ c1)
  elrab(hs0, c1, csalg, (‚ãÉ hs0 = ‚ãÉ c2 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ hs0), (‚ãÉ c1 = ‚ãÉ c2 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1))
  anbi12d(hs0 = c1, ‚ãÉ hs0 = ‚ãÉ c2, c2 ‚äÜ hs0, ‚ãÉ c1 = ‚ãÉ c2, c2 ‚äÜ c1)
  eqeq1d(‚ãÉ hs0, ‚ãÉ c2, ‚ãÉ c1, hs0 = c1)
  unieq(hs0, c1)
  sseq2(hs0, c1, c2)
  intss1(c1, { hs0 ‚àà SAlg |(‚ãÉ hs0 = ‚ãÉ c2 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ hs0)})
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(csalg)
  diff.hs0.w((‚ãÉ c1 = ‚ãÉ c2 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ c1))
}

blocks.name: salgenuni
blocks.content: The base set of the sigma-algebra generated by a set is the union of the set itself. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Jan-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm salgenuni(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cuni(c0), c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(csalgen, c2))
  -| wceq(c1, cuni(c2))
} = {
  eqtrd(cuni(c0), c1, cuni(cint(crab(hs0, csalg, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c2)), wss(c2, cv(hs0)))))), w0)
  unieqd(c0, cint(crab(hs0, csalg, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c2)), wss(c2, cv(hs0))))), w0)
  eqtrd(c0, cint(crab(hs0, csalg, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c2)), wss(c2, cv(hs0))))), cfv(csalgen, c2), w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(c0, cfv(csalgen, c2)))
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(csalgen, c2), cint(crab(hs0, csalg, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c2)), wss(c2, cv(hs0)))))), wcel(c2, c3))
  salgenval(hs0, c2, c3)
  intsaluni(hs1, crab(hs0, csalg, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c2)), wss(c2, cv(hs0)))), c1, w0)
  a1i(w0, wss(crab(hs0, csalg, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c2)), wss(c2, cv(hs0)))), csalg))
  ssrab2(hs0, csalg, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c2)), wss(c2, cv(hs0))))
  syl(w0, wne(crab(hs0, csalg, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c2)), wss(c2, cv(hs0)))), emptycls), wcel(c2, c3))
  salgenn0(hs0, c2, c3)
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), crab(hs0, csalg, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c2)), wss(c2, cv(hs0))))), wceq(cuni(cv(hs1)), c1))
  eqtrd(cuni(cv(hs1)), c1, cuni(c2), wcel(cv(hs1), crab(hs0, csalg, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c2)), wss(c2, cv(hs0))))))
  simprld(wcel(cv(hs1), crab(hs0, csalg, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c2)), wss(c2, cv(hs0))))), wceq(cuni(cv(hs1)), cuni(c2)), wcel(cv(hs1), csalg), wss(c2, cv(hs1)))
  biimpi(wcel(cv(hs1), crab(hs0, csalg, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c2)), wss(c2, cv(hs0))))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), csalg), wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs1)), cuni(c2)), wss(c2, cv(hs1)))))
  elrab(hs0, cv(hs1), csalg, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c2)), wss(c2, cv(hs0))), wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs1)), cuni(c2)), wss(c2, cv(hs1))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c2)), wss(c2, cv(hs0)), wceq(cuni(cv(hs1)), cuni(c2)), wss(c2, cv(hs1)))
  eqeq1d(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c2), cuni(cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  unieq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  sseq2(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c2)
  a1i(wcel(cv(hs1), crab(hs0, csalg, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c2)), wss(c2, cv(hs0))))), wceq(cuni(c2), c1))
  eqcomi(cuni(c2), c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(crab(hs0, csalg, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c2)), wss(c2, cv(hs0)))))
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(csalg)
  diff.hs0.c(cv(hs1))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs1)), cuni(c2)), wss(c2, cv(hs1))))
}

thm salgenuni(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí ‚ãÉ c0 = c1)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(SalGen ` c2)
  ‚ä£ c1 = ‚ãÉ c2
} = {
  eqtrd(‚ãÉ c0, c1, ‚ãÉ ‚ãÇ { hs0 ‚àà SAlg |(‚ãÉ hs0 = ‚ãÉ c2 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ hs0)}, w0)
  unieqd(c0, ‚ãÇ { hs0 ‚àà SAlg |(‚ãÉ hs0 = ‚ãÉ c2 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ hs0)}, w0)
  eqtrd(c0, ‚ãÇ { hs0 ‚àà SAlg |(‚ãÉ hs0 = ‚ãÉ c2 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ hs0)}, (SalGen ` c2), w0)
  a1i(w0, c0 =(SalGen ` c2))
  syl(w0, (SalGen ` c2)= ‚ãÇ { hs0 ‚àà SAlg |(‚ãÉ hs0 = ‚ãÉ c2 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ hs0)}, c2 ‚àà c3)
  salgenval(hs0, c2, c3)
  intsaluni(hs1, { hs0 ‚àà SAlg |(‚ãÉ hs0 = ‚ãÉ c2 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ hs0)}, c1, w0)
  a1i(w0, { hs0 ‚àà SAlg |(‚ãÉ hs0 = ‚ãÉ c2 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ hs0)} ‚äÜ SAlg)
  ssrab2(hs0, csalg, (‚ãÉ hs0 = ‚ãÉ c2 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ hs0))
  syl(w0, { hs0 ‚àà SAlg |(‚ãÉ hs0 = ‚ãÉ c2 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ hs0)} ‚â† ‚àÖ, c2 ‚àà c3)
  salgenn0(hs0, c2, c3)
  adantl(w0, hs1 ‚àà { hs0 ‚àà SAlg |(‚ãÉ hs0 = ‚ãÉ c2 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ hs0)}, ‚ãÉ hs1 = c1)
  eqtrd(‚ãÉ hs1, c1, ‚ãÉ c2, hs1 ‚àà { hs0 ‚àà SAlg |(‚ãÉ hs0 = ‚ãÉ c2 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ hs0)})
  simprld(hs1 ‚àà { hs0 ‚àà SAlg |(‚ãÉ hs0 = ‚ãÉ c2 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ hs0)}, ‚ãÉ hs1 = ‚ãÉ c2, hs1 ‚àà SAlg, c2 ‚äÜ hs1)
  biimpi(hs1 ‚àà { hs0 ‚àà SAlg |(‚ãÉ hs0 = ‚ãÉ c2 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ hs0)}, (hs1 ‚àà SAlg ‚àß(‚ãÉ hs1 = ‚ãÉ c2 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ hs1)))
  elrab(hs0, hs1, csalg, (‚ãÉ hs0 = ‚ãÉ c2 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ hs0), (‚ãÉ hs1 = ‚ãÉ c2 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ hs1))
  anbi12d(hs0 = hs1, ‚ãÉ hs0 = ‚ãÉ c2, c2 ‚äÜ hs0, ‚ãÉ hs1 = ‚ãÉ c2, c2 ‚äÜ hs1)
  eqeq1d(‚ãÉ hs0, ‚ãÉ c2, ‚ãÉ hs1, hs0 = hs1)
  unieq(hs0, hs1)
  sseq2(hs0, hs1, c2)
  a1i(hs1 ‚àà { hs0 ‚àà SAlg |(‚ãÉ hs0 = ‚ãÉ c2 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ hs0)}, ‚ãÉ c2 = c1)
  eqcomi(‚ãÉ c2, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c({ hs0 ‚àà SAlg |(‚ãÉ hs0 = ‚ãÉ c2 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ hs0)})
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(csalg)
  diff.hs0.c(hs1)
  diff.hs0.w((‚ãÉ hs1 = ‚ãÉ c2 ‚àß c2 ‚äÜ hs1))
}

blocks.name: issalgend
blocks.content: One side of ~ dfsalgen2 . If a sigma-algebra on ` U. X ` includes ` X ` and it is included in all the sigma-algebras with such two properties, then it is the sigma-algebra generated by ` X ` . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Jan-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm issalgend(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(csalgen, c0), c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, csalg))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cuni(c1), cuni(c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), csalg), wceq(cuni(cv(s0)), cuni(c0)), wss(c0, cv(s0)))), wss(c1, cv(s0)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqssd(cfv(csalgen, c0), c1, w0)
  salgenss(cfv(csalgen, c0), c1, c0, c2, w0)
  eqid(cfv(csalgen, c0))
  sseqtr4d(c1, cfv(csalgen, c0), cint(crab(hs0, csalg, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c0)), wss(c0, cv(hs0))))), w0)
  sylibr(w0, wss(c1, cint(crab(hs0, csalg, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c0)), wss(c0, cv(hs0)))))), wral(s0, crab(hs0, csalg, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c0)), wss(c0, cv(hs0)))), wss(c1, cv(s0))))
  ralrimiva(s0, crab(hs0, csalg, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c0)), wss(c0, cv(hs0)))), w0, wss(c1, cv(s0)))
  syl13anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), crab(hs0, csalg, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c0)), wss(c0, cv(hs0)))))), wss(c1, cv(s0)), w0, wcel(cv(s0), csalg), wceq(cuni(cv(s0)), cuni(c0)), wss(c0, cv(s0)))
  simpl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), crab(hs0, csalg, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c0)), wss(c0, cv(hs0))))))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), crab(hs0, csalg, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c0)), wss(c0, cv(hs0))))), wcel(cv(s0), csalg))
  elrabi(hs0, cv(s0), csalg, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c0)), wss(c0, cv(hs0))))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), crab(hs0, csalg, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c0)), wss(c0, cv(hs0))))), wceq(cuni(cv(s0)), cuni(c0)))
  simprld(wcel(cv(s0), crab(hs0, csalg, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c0)), wss(c0, cv(hs0))))), wceq(cuni(cv(s0)), cuni(c0)), wcel(cv(s0), csalg), wss(c0, cv(s0)))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), crab(hs0, csalg, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c0)), wss(c0, cv(hs0))))), wss(c0, cv(s0)))
  simprrd(wcel(cv(s0), crab(hs0, csalg, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c0)), wss(c0, cv(hs0))))), wss(c0, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), csalg), wceq(cuni(cv(s0)), cuni(c0)))
  biimpi(wcel(cv(s0), crab(hs0, csalg, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c0)), wss(c0, cv(hs0))))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), csalg), wa(wceq(cuni(cv(s0)), cuni(c0)), wss(c0, cv(s0)))))
  elrab(hs0, cv(s0), csalg, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c0)), wss(c0, cv(hs0))), wa(wceq(cuni(cv(s0)), cuni(c0)), wss(c0, cv(s0))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c0)), wss(c0, cv(hs0)), wceq(cuni(cv(s0)), cuni(c0)), wss(c0, cv(s0)))
  eqeq1d(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c0), cuni(cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  unieq(cv(hs0), cv(s0))
  sseq2(cv(hs0), cv(s0), c0)
  ssint(s0, c1, crab(hs0, csalg, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c0)), wss(c0, cv(hs0)))))
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(csalgen, c0), cint(crab(hs0, csalg, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c0)), wss(c0, cv(hs0)))))), wcel(c0, c2))
  salgenval(hs0, c0, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s0))
  diff.hs0.c(csalg)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wceq(cuni(cv(s0)), cuni(c0)), wss(c0, cv(s0))))
  diff.crab.s(s0, hs0, csalg, wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c0)), wss(c0, cv(hs0))))
  diff.csalg.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c0)), wss(c0, cv(hs0)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c0))
  diff.cuni.s(s0, cv(hs0))
  diff.cuni.s(s0, c0)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c0, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}

thm issalgend(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(SalGen ` c0)= c1)

  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà SAlg)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí ‚ãÉ c1 = ‚ãÉ c0)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚äÜ c1)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà SAlg ‚àß ‚ãÉ s0 = ‚ãÉ c0 ‚àß c0 ‚äÜ s0))‚Üí c1 ‚äÜ s0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqssd((SalGen ` c0), c1, w0)
  salgenss((SalGen ` c0), c1, c0, c2, w0)
  eqid((SalGen ` c0))
  sseqtr4d(c1, (SalGen ` c0), ‚ãÇ { hs0 ‚àà SAlg |(‚ãÉ hs0 = ‚ãÉ c0 ‚àß c0 ‚äÜ hs0)}, w0)
  sylibr(w0, c1 ‚äÜ ‚ãÇ { hs0 ‚àà SAlg |(‚ãÉ hs0 = ‚ãÉ c0 ‚àß c0 ‚äÜ hs0)}, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà { hs0 ‚àà SAlg |(‚ãÉ hs0 = ‚ãÉ c0 ‚àß c0 ‚äÜ hs0)}, c1 ‚äÜ s0))
  ralrimiva(s0, { hs0 ‚àà SAlg |(‚ãÉ hs0 = ‚ãÉ c0 ‚àß c0 ‚äÜ hs0)}, w0, c1 ‚äÜ s0)
  syl13anc((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà { hs0 ‚àà SAlg |(‚ãÉ hs0 = ‚ãÉ c0 ‚àß c0 ‚äÜ hs0)}), c1 ‚äÜ s0, w0, s0 ‚àà SAlg, ‚ãÉ s0 = ‚ãÉ c0, c0 ‚äÜ s0)
  simpl(w0, s0 ‚àà { hs0 ‚àà SAlg |(‚ãÉ hs0 = ‚ãÉ c0 ‚àß c0 ‚äÜ hs0)})
  adantl(w0, s0 ‚àà { hs0 ‚àà SAlg |(‚ãÉ hs0 = ‚ãÉ c0 ‚àß c0 ‚äÜ hs0)}, s0 ‚àà SAlg)
  elrabi(hs0, s0, csalg, (‚ãÉ hs0 = ‚ãÉ c0 ‚àß c0 ‚äÜ hs0))
  adantl(w0, s0 ‚àà { hs0 ‚àà SAlg |(‚ãÉ hs0 = ‚ãÉ c0 ‚àß c0 ‚äÜ hs0)}, ‚ãÉ s0 = ‚ãÉ c0)
  simprld(s0 ‚àà { hs0 ‚àà SAlg |(‚ãÉ hs0 = ‚ãÉ c0 ‚àß c0 ‚äÜ hs0)}, ‚ãÉ s0 = ‚ãÉ c0, s0 ‚àà SAlg, c0 ‚äÜ s0)
  adantl(w0, s0 ‚àà { hs0 ‚àà SAlg |(‚ãÉ hs0 = ‚ãÉ c0 ‚àß c0 ‚äÜ hs0)}, c0 ‚äÜ s0)
  simprrd(s0 ‚àà { hs0 ‚àà SAlg |(‚ãÉ hs0 = ‚ãÉ c0 ‚àß c0 ‚äÜ hs0)}, c0 ‚äÜ s0, s0 ‚àà SAlg, ‚ãÉ s0 = ‚ãÉ c0)
  biimpi(s0 ‚àà { hs0 ‚àà SAlg |(‚ãÉ hs0 = ‚ãÉ c0 ‚àß c0 ‚äÜ hs0)}, (s0 ‚àà SAlg ‚àß(‚ãÉ s0 = ‚ãÉ c0 ‚àß c0 ‚äÜ s0)))
  elrab(hs0, s0, csalg, (‚ãÉ hs0 = ‚ãÉ c0 ‚àß c0 ‚äÜ hs0), (‚ãÉ s0 = ‚ãÉ c0 ‚àß c0 ‚äÜ s0))
  anbi12d(hs0 = s0, ‚ãÉ hs0 = ‚ãÉ c0, c0 ‚äÜ hs0, ‚ãÉ s0 = ‚ãÉ c0, c0 ‚äÜ s0)
  eqeq1d(‚ãÉ hs0, ‚ãÉ c0, ‚ãÉ s0, hs0 = s0)
  unieq(hs0, s0)
  sseq2(hs0, s0, c0)
  ssint(s0, c1, { hs0 ‚àà SAlg |(‚ãÉ hs0 = ‚ãÉ c0 ‚àß c0 ‚äÜ hs0)})
  syl(w0, (SalGen ` c0)= ‚ãÇ { hs0 ‚àà SAlg |(‚ãÉ hs0 = ‚ãÉ c0 ‚àß c0 ‚äÜ hs0)}, c0 ‚àà c2)
  salgenval(hs0, c0, c2)

blocks.name: salexct2
blocks.content: An example of a subset that does not belong to a nontrivial sigma-algebra, see ~ salexct . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Jan-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm salexct2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wn(wcel(c0, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, co(nat0, cicc, nat2))
  -| wceq(c1, crab(s0, cpw(c2), wo(wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wbr(cdif(c2, cv(s0)), cdom, com))))
  -| wceq(c0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  mtbir(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cpw(c2)), wo(wbr(c0, cdom, com), wbr(cdif(c2, c0), cdom, com))))

blocks.name: unisalgen
blocks.content: The union of a set belongs to the sigma-algebra generated by the set. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Jan-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm unisalgen(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(csalgen, c2))
  -| wceq(c0, cuni(c2))
} = {
  eqeltrd(c0, c1, cuni(c1), w0)
  eqcomd(c0, cuni(c1), w0)
  salgenuni(c1, c0, c2, c3, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(cuni(c1), c1), wcel(c1, csalg))
  eqeltrd(c1, csalg, cfv(csalgen, c2), w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(c1, cfv(csalgen, c2)))
  syl(w0, wcel(cfv(csalgen, c2), csalg), wcel(c2, c3))
  salgencl(c2, c3)
  saluni(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm unisalgen(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c1)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(SalGen ` c2)
  ‚ä£ c0 = ‚ãÉ c2
} = {
  eqeltrd(c0, c1, ‚ãÉ c1, w0)
  eqcomd(c0, ‚ãÉ c1, w0)
  salgenuni(c1, c0, c2, c3, w0)
  syl(w0, ‚ãÉ c1 ‚àà c1, c1 ‚àà SAlg)
  eqeltrd(c1, csalg, (SalGen ` c2), w0)
  a1i(w0, c1 =(SalGen ` c2))
  syl(w0, (SalGen ` c2)‚àà SAlg, c2 ‚àà c3)
  salgencl(c2, c3)
  saluni(c1)
}

blocks.name: dfsalgen2

blocks.name: salgencntex
blocks.content: This counterexample shows that ~ df-salgen needs to require that all containing sigma-algebra have the same base set. Otherwise, the intersection could lead to a set that is not a sigma-algebra. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Jan-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm salgencntex(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wn(wcel(c0, csalg))

  -| wceq(c3, co(nat0, cicc, nat1))
  -| wceq(c4, cpw(c3))
  -| wceq(c5, cin(c2, c4))
  -| wceq(c0, cint(crab(s1, csalg, wss(c5, cv(s1)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)

  mpbir(wcel(c4, crab(s1, csalg, wss(c5, cv(s1)))), wa(wcel(c4, csalg), wss(c5, c4)))
  pm3.2i(wcel(c4, csalg), wss(c5, c4))
  eqeltri(c4, csalg, cpw(c3))

  unieqi(c4, cpw(c3))
  unipw(c3)
  mpbir(wss(c3, cuni(c0)), wral(hs0, c3, wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(c0))))
  rgen(hs0, c3, wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(c0)))
  sylibr(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs0), cuni(c0)), wrex(hs1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))

  syl(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(csn(cv(hs0)), cpw(c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))

  syl3anc(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wbr(nat0, cle, cv(hs0)), wcel(nat0, cxr), wcel(nat1, cxr), wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cicc, nat1)))
  iccgelb(nat0, nat1, cv(hs0))
  letrd(cv(hs0), nat2, nat1, wcel(cv(hs0), c3))
  sseldi(cv(hs0), cr, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), wcel(cv(hs0), c3))
  unitssre()
  a1i(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(nat1, cr))
  1re()
  a1i(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(nat2, cr))

  rexrd(nat0, wcel(cv(hs0), c3))
  0red(wcel(cv(hs0), c3))
  a1i(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(nat1, cxr))
  1xr()
  syl6eleq(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cicc, nat1), c3, wcel(cv(hs0), c3))

  a1i(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wbr(csn(cv(hs0)), cdom, com))

  snfi(cv(hs0))

  breq1(cv(s0), csn(cv(hs0)), cdom, com)
  breq1d(cdif(c1, cv(s0)), cdom, com, cdif(c1, csn(cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(s0), csn(cv(hs0))))

  syl6eleqr(csn(cv(hs0)), c4, cpw(c3), wcel(cv(hs0), c3))
  snelpwi(cv(hs0), c3)
  a1i(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wceq(cin(c2, c4), c5))

thm salgencntex(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ‚ä¢ ¬¨ c0 ‚àà SAlg
  ‚ä£ c1 =(0[[,]]2)

  ‚ä£ c3 =(0[[,]]1)

  ‚ä£ c5 =(c2 ‚ãÇ c4)
  ‚ä£ c0 = ‚ãÇ { s1 ‚àà SAlg | c5 ‚äÜ s1 }
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)

  unipw(c3)

  rgen(hs0, c3, hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ c0)
  sylibr(hs0 ‚àà c3, hs0 ‚àà ‚ãÉ c0, ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà hs1))
  syl2anc(hs0 ‚àà c3, ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà hs1), { hs0 } ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà { hs0 })
  syl6eleqr({ hs0 }, c0, ‚ãÇ { s1 ‚àà SAlg | c5 ‚äÜ s1 }, hs0 ‚àà c3)
  sylibr(hs0 ‚àà c3, { hs0 } ‚àà ‚ãÇ { s1 ‚àà SAlg | c5 ‚äÜ s1 }, ‚àÄ(hs2 ‚àà { s1 ‚àà SAlg | c5 ‚äÜ s1 }, { hs0 } ‚àà hs2))
  ralrimiva(hs2, { s1 ‚àà SAlg | c5 ‚äÜ s1 }, hs0 ‚àà c3, { hs0 } ‚àà hs2)
  sseldd({ hs0 }, hs2, c5, (hs0 ‚àà c3 ‚àß hs2 ‚àà { s1 ‚àà SAlg | c5 ‚äÜ s1 }))

blocks.name: salgensscntex
blocks.content: This counterexample shows that the sigma-algebra generated by a set is not the smallest sigma-algebra containing the set, if we consider also sigma-algebras with a larger base set. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Jan-2021.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: issalnnd
blocks.content: Sufficient condition to prove that ` S ` is sigma-algebra. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Mar-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm issalnnd(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, csalg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(emptycls, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cdif(c2, cv(s0)), c0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wf(cv(s1), cn, c0)), wcel(ciun(s2, cn, cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2))), c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  issald(s0, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  pm2.61dan(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c0)), wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com)), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0), wceq(cv(s0), emptycls))
  3ad2antl1(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c0)), wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wceq(cv(s0), emptycls), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0))
  eqeltrd(cuni(cv(s0)), c0, emptycls, wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), emptycls)))
  adantl(w0, wceq(cv(s0), emptycls), wceq(cuni(cv(s0)), emptycls))
  eqtrd(cuni(cv(s0)), emptycls, cuni(emptycls), wceq(cv(s0), emptycls))
  unieq(cv(s0), emptycls)
  a1i(wceq(cv(s0), emptycls), wceq(cuni(emptycls), emptycls))
  uni0()
  adantr(w0, wceq(cv(s0), emptycls), wcel(emptycls, c0))
  syldan(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c0)), wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com)), wn(wceq(cv(s0), emptycls)), wcel(cuni(cv(s0)), c0), wne(cv(s0), emptycls))

blocks.name: dmvolsal
blocks.content: Lebesgue measurable sets form a sigma-algebra. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 3-Mar-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm dmvolsal() {
  |- wcel(cdm(cvol), csalg)
} = {
  mptru(wcel(cdm(cvol), csalg))

  eqcomi(cr, cuni(cdm(cvol)))
  unidmvol()

  cmmbl(cv(hs0))
  adantl(wtru, wf(cv(hs1), cn, cdm(cvol)), wcel(ciun(hs2, cn, cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), cdm(cvol)))
  syl(wf(cv(hs1), cn, cdm(cvol)), wcel(ciun(hs2, cn, cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), cdm(cvol)), wral(hs2, cn, wcel(cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), cdm(cvol))))
  ralrimiva(hs2, cn, wf(cv(hs1), cn, cdm(cvol)), wcel(cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), cdm(cvol)))
  ffvelrn(cv(hs1), cn, cdm(cvol), cv(hs2))
  iunmbl(hs2, cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(cdm(cvol))
  diff.hs1.c(cdm(cvol))
  diff.hs0.w(wtru)

}

blocks.name: saldifcld
blocks.content: The complement of an element of a sigma-algebra is in the sigma-algebra. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)

blocks.name: saluncld
blocks.content: The union of two sets in a sigma-algebra is in the sigma-algebra. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)

blocks.name: salgencld
blocks.content: ` SalGen ` actually generates a sigma-algebra. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)

blocks.name: 0sald
blocks.content: The empty set belongs to every sigma-algebra. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)

blocks.name: iooborel
blocks.content: An open interval is a Borel set. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)

blocks.name: salincld
blocks.content: The intersection of two sets in a sigma-algebra is in the sigma-algebra. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)

blocks.name: salunid
blocks.content: A set is an element of any sigma-algebra on it . (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)

blocks.name: unisalgen2
blocks.content: The union of a set belongs is equal to the union of the sigma-algebra generated by the set. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)

} = {
  simp2d(w0, wceq(cuni(c0), cuni(c1)), wcel(c0, csalg), wss(c1, c0))
  simpld(w0, w3a(wcel(c0, csalg), wceq(cuni(c0), cuni(c1)), wss(c1, c0)), wral(hs0, csalg, wi(wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c1)), wss(c1, cv(hs0))), wss(c0, cv(hs0)))))
  mpbid(w0, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, csalg), wceq(cuni(c0), cuni(c1)), wss(c1, c0)), wral(hs0, csalg, wi(wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(c1)), wss(c1, cv(hs0))), wss(c0, cv(hs0))))), wceq(cfv(csalgen, c1), c0))
  a1i(w0, wceq(cfv(csalgen, c1), c0))
  eqcomi(cfv(csalgen, c1), c0)
  dfsalgen2(hs0, c1, c0, c2, w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)

}

blocks.name: bor1sal
blocks.content: The Borel sigma-algebra on the Reals. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)

blocks.name: iocborel
blocks.content: A left-open, right-closed interval is a Borel set. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)

  eqcomd(co(c0, cioc, c1), ciin(hs0, cn, co(c0, cioo, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, cv(hs0))))), w0)
  iooiinioc(hs0, c0, c1, w0)

  mptru(wcel(ciin(hs0, cn, co(c0, cioo, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, cv(hs0))))), c2))
  saliincl(hs0, cn, co(c0, cioo, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, cv(hs0)))), c2, wtru)
  a1i(wtru, wcel(c2, csalg))
  bor1sal(c2, c3)
  a1i(wtru, wbr(cn, cdom, com))
  nnct()
  a1i(wtru, wne(cn, emptycls))
  nnn0()
  a1i(wa(wtru, wcel(cv(hs0), cn)), wcel(co(c0, cioo, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, cv(hs0)))), c2))
  iooborel(c0, co(c1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, cv(hs0))), c2, c3)

blocks.name: subsaliuncllem
blocks.content: A subspace sigma-algebra is closed under countable union. This is Lemma 121A (iii) of [Fremlin1] p. 35. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm subsaliuncllem(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wrex(s0, co(c0, cmap, cn), wral(s1, cn, wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cin(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c2)))))
  -| wnf(s2, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wceq(c4, cmpt(s1, cn, crab(s3, c0, wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cin(cv(s3), c2)))))
  -| wceq(c5, ccom(c6, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wfn(c6, crn(c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wral(s2, crn(c4), wcel(cfv(c6, cv(s2)), cv(s2))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)

blocks.name: subsaliuncl
blocks.content: A subspace sigma-algebra is closed under countable union. This is Lemma 121A (iii) of [Fremlin1] p. 35. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:

  diff.hs2.w((c0 ` hs4)=(hs5 ‚ãÇ c3))
  diff.hs5.w((c0 ` hs4)=(hs2 ‚ãÇ c3))
  diff.hs5.c(ran((s0 ‚àà ‚Ñï ‚Ü¶ { hs2 ‚àà c2 |(c0 ` s0)=(hs2 ‚ãÇ c3)})))
  diff.hs3.w((hs1 ` hs5)‚àà hs5)
  diff.hs5.w((hs1 ` hs3)‚àà hs3)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w(‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñï,(c0 ` s0))‚àà c1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, hs0 ‚àà(c2[‚Ü¶]‚Ñï))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, (c2[‚Ü¶]‚Ñï))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c2, cmap, cn)
  diff.cmap.s(s0)
  diff.cn.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: subsalsal
blocks.content: A subspace sigma-algebra is a sigma algebra. This is Lemma 121A of [Fremlin1] p. 35. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm subsalsal(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, csalg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, csalg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wceq(c0, co(c1, crest, c2))
} = {
  issalnnd(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, universe, cuni(c0), w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(c0, universe))
  ovexi(c0, c1, crest, c2)
  syl6eleqr(emptycls, c0, co(c1, crest, c2), w0)
  elrestd(emptycls, c1, c2, csalg, c3, emptycls, w0)
  0sald(c1, w0)
  eqcomi(emptycls, cin(emptycls, c2))
  0in(c2)
  eqid(cuni(c0))
  mpd(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cdif(cuni(c0), cv(hs0)), c0), wrex(hs3, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs3), c2))))
  mpbid(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wrex(hs3, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs3), c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, crest, c2)))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, crest, c2)))
  syl6eleq(cv(hs0), co(c1, crest, c2), c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  id(wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, crest, c2)), wrex(hs3, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs3), c2)))))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, crest, c2)), wrex(hs3, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs3), c2)))), wcel(c1, csalg), wcel(c2, c3))
  elrest(hs3, c1, csalg, c2, c3, cv(hs0))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wi(wrex(hs3, c1, wceq(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs3), c2))), wcel(cdif(cuni(c0), cv(hs0)), c0)))
  rexlimdv(hs3, c1, w0, wceq(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs3), c2)), wcel(cdif(cuni(c0), cv(hs0)), c0))
  3exp(w0, wcel(cv(hs3), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs3), c2)), wcel(cdif(cuni(c0), cv(hs0)), c0))
  mpbird(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(hs3), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs3), c2))), wcel(cdif(cuni(c0), cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(cin(cdif(cuni(c1), cv(hs3)), c2), co(c1, crest, c2)))
  elrestd(cin(cdif(cuni(c1), cv(hs3)), c2), c1, c2, csalg, c3, cdif(cuni(c1), cv(hs3)), w3a(w0, wcel(cv(hs3), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs3), c2))))
  3adant3(w0, wcel(cv(hs3), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs3), c2)), wcel(c1, csalg))
  3ad2ant1(w0, wcel(cv(hs3), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs3), c2)), wcel(c2, c3))
  3adant3(w0, wcel(cv(hs3), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs3), c2)), wcel(cdif(cuni(c1), cv(hs3)), c1))
  saldifcld(c1, cv(hs3), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs3), c1)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs3), c1), wcel(c1, csalg))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs3), c1))
  eqid(cin(cdif(cuni(c1), cv(hs3)), c2))
  3adant2(w0, wcel(cv(hs3), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs3), c2)), wb(wcel(cdif(cuni(c0), cv(hs0)), c0), wcel(cin(cdif(cuni(c1), cv(hs3)), c2), co(c1, crest, c2))))
  eleq12d(cdif(cuni(c0), cv(hs0)), c0, cin(cdif(cuni(c1), cv(hs3)), c2), co(c1, crest, c2), wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs3), c2))))
  eqtrd(cdif(cuni(c0), cv(hs0)), cin(cdif(cuni(c1), cv(hs3)), c2), cdif(cin(cuni(c1), c2), cin(cv(hs3), c2)), wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs3), c2))))
  difeq12d(cuni(c0), cv(hs0), cin(cuni(c1), c2), cin(cv(hs3), c2), wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs3), c2))))
  adantr(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs3), c2)), wceq(cuni(c0), cin(cuni(c1), c2)))
  eqtrd(cuni(c0), cin(cuni(c1), c2), cuni(co(c1, crest, c2)), w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cuni(c0), cuni(co(c1, crest, c2))))
  unieqi(c0, co(c1, crest, c2))
  restuni3(c1, c2, csalg, c3, w0)
  simpr(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs3), c2)))
  a1i(wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs3), c2))), wceq(cdif(cin(cuni(c1), c2), cin(cv(hs3), c2)), cin(cdif(cuni(c1), cv(hs3)), c2)))
  eqcomi(cdif(cin(cuni(c1), c2), cin(cv(hs3), c2)), cin(cdif(cuni(c1), cv(hs3)), c2))
  indifdir(cuni(c1), cv(hs3), c2)
  a1i(wa(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), cin(cv(hs3), c2))), wceq(c0, co(c1, crest, c2)))
  subsaliuncl(hs2, cv(hs1), c0, c1, c2, c3, wa(w0, wf(cv(hs1), cn, c0)))
  adantr(w0, wf(cv(hs1), cn, c0), wcel(c1, csalg))
  adantr(w0, wf(cv(hs1), cn, c0), wcel(c2, c3))
  simpr(w0, wf(cv(hs1), cn, c0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs3.c(c1)
  diff.hs3.c(c2)
  diff.hs3.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs3.w(w0)
  diff.hs3.w(wcel(cdif(cuni(c0), cv(hs0)), c0))
  diff.hs2.c(cv(hs1))
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.w(wa(w0, wf(cv(hs1), cn, c0)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm subsalsal(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà SAlg)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà SAlg)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(c1[|`t]c2)
} = {
  issalnnd(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, universe, ‚ãÉ c0, w0)
  a1i(w0, c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  ovexi(c0, c1, crest, c2)
  syl6eleqr(emptycls, c0, (c1[|`t]c2), w0)
  elrestd(emptycls, c1, c2, csalg, c3, emptycls, w0)
  0sald(c1, w0)
  eqcomi(emptycls, (‚àÖ ‚ãÇ c2))
  0in(c2)
  eqid(‚ãÉ c0)
  mpd((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c0), (‚ãÉ c0 \ hs0)‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(hs3 ‚àà c1, hs0 =(hs3 ‚ãÇ c2)))
  mpbid((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c0), ‚àÉ(hs3 ‚àà c1, hs0 =(hs3 ‚ãÇ c2)), hs0 ‚àà(c1[|`t]c2))
  adantl(w0, hs0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà(c1[|`t]c2))
  syl6eleq(hs0, (c1[|`t]c2), c0, hs0 ‚àà c0)
  id(hs0 ‚àà c0)
  adantr(w0, hs0 ‚àà c0, (hs0 ‚àà(c1[|`t]c2)‚Üî ‚àÉ(hs3 ‚àà c1, hs0 =(hs3 ‚ãÇ c2))))
  syl2anc(w0, (hs0 ‚àà(c1[|`t]c2)‚Üî ‚àÉ(hs3 ‚àà c1, hs0 =(hs3 ‚ãÇ c2))), c1 ‚àà SAlg, c2 ‚àà c3)
  elrest(hs3, c1, csalg, c2, c3, hs0)
  adantr(w0, hs0 ‚àà c0, (‚àÉ(hs3 ‚àà c1, hs0 =(hs3 ‚ãÇ c2))‚Üí(‚ãÉ c0 \ hs0)‚àà c0))
  rexlimdv(hs3, c1, w0, hs0 =(hs3 ‚ãÇ c2), (‚ãÉ c0 \ hs0)‚àà c0)
  3exp(w0, hs3 ‚àà c1, hs0 =(hs3 ‚ãÇ c2), (‚ãÉ c0 \ hs0)‚àà c0)
  mpbird((w0 ‚àß hs3 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs0 =(hs3 ‚ãÇ c2)), (‚ãÉ c0 \ hs0)‚àà c0, ((‚ãÉ c1 \ hs3)‚ãÇ c2)‚àà(c1[|`t]c2))
  elrestd(((‚ãÉ c1 \ hs3)‚ãÇ c2), c1, c2, csalg, c3, (‚ãÉ c1 \ hs3), (w0 ‚àß hs3 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs0 =(hs3 ‚ãÇ c2)))
  3adant3(w0, hs3 ‚àà c1, hs0 =(hs3 ‚ãÇ c2), c1 ‚àà SAlg)
  3ad2ant1(w0, hs3 ‚àà c1, hs0 =(hs3 ‚ãÇ c2), c2 ‚àà c3)
  3adant3(w0, hs3 ‚àà c1, hs0 =(hs3 ‚ãÇ c2), (‚ãÉ c1 \ hs3)‚àà c1)
  saldifcld(c1, hs3, (w0 ‚àß hs3 ‚àà c1))
  adantr(w0, hs3 ‚àà c1, c1 ‚àà SAlg)
  simpr(w0, hs3 ‚àà c1)
  eqid(((‚ãÉ c1 \ hs3)‚ãÇ c2))
  3adant2(w0, hs3 ‚àà c1, hs0 =(hs3 ‚ãÇ c2), ((‚ãÉ c0 \ hs0)‚àà c0 ‚Üî((‚ãÉ c1 \ hs3)‚ãÇ c2)‚àà(c1[|`t]c2)))
  eleq12d((‚ãÉ c0 \ hs0), c0, ((‚ãÉ c1 \ hs3)‚ãÇ c2), (c1[|`t]c2), (w0 ‚àß hs0 =(hs3 ‚ãÇ c2)))
  eqtrd((‚ãÉ c0 \ hs0), ((‚ãÉ c1 \ hs3)‚ãÇ c2), ((‚ãÉ c1 ‚ãÇ c2)\(hs3 ‚ãÇ c2)), (w0 ‚àß hs0 =(hs3 ‚ãÇ c2)))
  difeq12d(‚ãÉ c0, hs0, (‚ãÉ c1 ‚ãÇ c2), (hs3 ‚ãÇ c2), (w0 ‚àß hs0 =(hs3 ‚ãÇ c2)))
  adantr(w0, hs0 =(hs3 ‚ãÇ c2), ‚ãÉ c0 =(‚ãÉ c1 ‚ãÇ c2))
  eqtrd(‚ãÉ c0, (‚ãÉ c1 ‚ãÇ c2), ‚ãÉ(c1[|`t]c2), w0)
  a1i(w0, ‚ãÉ c0 = ‚ãÉ(c1[|`t]c2))
  unieqi(c0, (c1[|`t]c2))
  restuni3(c1, c2, csalg, c3, w0)
  simpr(w0, hs0 =(hs3 ‚ãÇ c2))
  a1i((w0 ‚àß hs0 =(hs3 ‚ãÇ c2)), ((‚ãÉ c1 ‚ãÇ c2)\(hs3 ‚ãÇ c2))=((‚ãÉ c1 \ hs3)‚ãÇ c2))
  eqcomi(((‚ãÉ c1 ‚ãÇ c2)\(hs3 ‚ãÇ c2)), ((‚ãÉ c1 \ hs3)‚ãÇ c2))
  indifdir(‚ãÉ c1, hs3, c2)
  a1i((w0 ‚àß hs0 =(hs3 ‚ãÇ c2)), c0 =(c1[|`t]c2))
  subsaliuncl(hs2, hs1, c0, c1, c2, c3, (w0 ‚àß(hs1 : ‚Ñï ‚Üí c0)))
  adantr(w0, (hs1 : ‚Ñï ‚Üí c0), c1 ‚àà SAlg)
  adantr(w0, (hs1 : ‚Ñï ‚Üí c0), c2 ‚àà c3)
  simpr(w0, (hs1 : ‚Ñï ‚Üí c0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs3.c(c1)
  diff.hs3.c(c2)
  diff.hs3.c(hs0)
  diff.hs3.w(w0)
  diff.hs3.w((‚ãÉ c0 \ hs0)‚àà c0)
  diff.hs2.c(hs1)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.w((w0 ‚àß(hs1 : ‚Ñï ‚Üí c0)))
}

blocks.name: subsaluni
blocks.content: A set belongs to the subspace sigma-algebra it induces. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm subsaluni(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, crest, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, csalg))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, cuni(c1)))
} = {
  eqeltrd(c0, co(c1, crest, c0), cuni(co(c1, crest, c0)), w0)
  eqcomd(c0, cuni(co(c1, crest, c0)), w0)
  restuni4(c1, c0, csalg, w0)
  salunid(co(c1, crest, c0), w0)
  subsalsal(co(c1, crest, c0), c1, c0, universe, w0)
  ssexd(c0, cuni(c1), universe, w0)
  uniexd(c1, csalg, w0)
  eqid(co(c1, crest, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm subsaluni(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà(c1[|`t]c0))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà SAlg)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚äÜ ‚ãÉ c1)
} = {
  eqeltrd(c0, (c1[|`t]c0), ‚ãÉ(c1[|`t]c0), w0)
  eqcomd(c0, ‚ãÉ(c1[|`t]c0), w0)
  restuni4(c1, c0, csalg, w0)
  salunid((c1[|`t]c0), w0)
  subsalsal((c1[|`t]c0), c1, c0, universe, w0)
  ssexd(c0, ‚ãÉ c1, universe, w0)
  uniexd(c1, csalg, w0)
  eqid((c1[|`t]c0))
}
